N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 355.4 - Notification of local department decisions-SSI and MA
State Regulations
(a) Each applicant for social services who is
an applicant for or recipient of supplemental security income or medical
assistance shall be notified in writing of the decision on his
application. (b) When an
application for services is denied, the letter of notification shall state
adequately and clearly the reasons for the denial. Notes
